scene.h4: A Date with Aerith :: Event Square - The Gondola
A Date with Tifa :: Event Square - The Gondola
A Date with Yuffie :: Event Square - The Gondola
A Date with Barret :: The Gondola
scene.p: Cloud and the others pass through North Corel on their way to Gold Saucer.

Man
A buncha guys called Turks came here sayin' they'd pay 10000 gil for some rock called a 'Keystone'.
When I asked how much they'd pay for a regular rock just layin' around here, they slapped me upside my damn head!!

Man 2
I'll never understand the rich. I heard some guy named Dio at the Gold Saucer is collectin' rocks!
They take the Ropeway up to Gold Saucer.

Fortune Telling Machine (at Wonder Square)
What you are looking for is near.
Cloud and the others make their way to Battle Square, which has by now reopened.

Man
I heard that this is the curator's favorite attraction. He likes it so much that he even has his collection displayed in the arena.

Woman
Are you here for the battle, too?

Cloud
- That's the idea
- Not interested

Woman
I like fighters. But hate those who're all talk.

Woman
Is that so.
Cloud continues on up the steps.

Black-haired Man
Crap! I still don't have enough points.
Mmm? You're new here, aren't you? Then, you want an explanation of the Battle Arena?

Cloud
- Yeah
- Not interested

Black-haired Man
You fight here and collect battle points. You can then exchange those points for prizes.
The Battle Game... even though it's a game you still use all your physical abilities. To participate, go to the front and pay yer GP's.
You can fight in up to eight battles. The more you win, the more battle points you get.
But, if you lose, you lose all your points. So it's up to you whether or not to fight after each win.
They also make it harder by givin' out handicaps.
They decide what handicaps there'll be, and you won't know what you're up against until the battle.
Oh yeah, once you leave the Battle area, all your battle points will become useless. So watch it.
Oh, and one other thing. The maximum points you could get is 65000, no more. So if you get that many you should exchange them for something.

Large Man
Maybe I could've made it a little further. It's so hard to know when to stop...
Man, I knew I should've stopped. But it's so hard to stop...

Man Practicing Kicks
I'm not going to lose this time!
All right, it should be my turn comin' up here soon.

Registration Lady
Hey, have you heard? Something awful happened!
Two staff members and some Shinra soldiers were shot.
The soldiers died instantly, but the staff survived.

Barret
Dyne......

Registration Lady
Register for battle? The registration fee is 10 GP.

Cloud
- Let's do it
- Not interested

Staff Person
Whenever you come to the Gold Saucer, I recommend you visit the owner's museum at least once.
Cloud enters Dio's Show Room. Various items rest on pedestals around the room, with plaques labeling them.

Item Plaques
"Star Cup"
"Weekend Clock"
"Laugh Sapling"
"Slayer's Pot"
"Chisa's Mask"
"Dio's Portrait"
"D Type Equipment"
"Zauger's Cup"
"Calling Gourd"
In the center display is the Keystone.

Cloud
It's the Keystone...
Dio enters from behind him.

Dio
Heh, heh, heh. Long time no see, my boy. Hmm? You like that, huh?

Cloud
Can you let me borrow this?

Dio
Heh, heh, heh. Sorry, but it's not for rent.
Hmm.
Since you've been good to me in the past, I CAN let you have it on one condition.

Cloud
One condition?

Dio
Heh, heh, heh. Entertain me!

Cloud
- What'd you want me to do?
- Not in the mood

p.span: What'd you want me to do?

scene.p:
Dio
Hoo boy!
Heh, heh, heh. It's not something that's really difficult.
This is the Battle Arena. Show me your fighting skills. Just you, my boy. I'm expecting a good fight!

Dio
I see... Then let's pretend that this never happened.
When Cloud takes him up on the deal, he enters the Battle Arena.

Dio
Heh, heh, heh! Well done, young man! All right, as I promised,
you can take it. Oh, and I'll give you this too.
Received "Protect Vest"
Received "Choco Feather"!

Dio
Hmm, you did pretty well, young man!
Good, it's a promise, so go ahead and take it. I'll give this to you too.
Received "Protect Vest"

Dio
That's the best you could do? Well, a promise is a promise. Go ahead, take it.
Received Key Item "Keystone"!

Dio
Well then, we shall meet again! Heh, heh, heh.
When trying to leave Gold Saucer with the keystone, Cloud is intercepted by a staff member.

Staff
Excuse me, sir.
I'm sorry. The Tram is out of order right now.

Cloud
...so?

Staff
I'm really sorry!
I'm afraid you won't be able to leave until it's fully repaired.
If Cait Sith is not in the party, he bounces up to join Cloud now.

Cait Sith
What's wrong?
Cloud explains.

Cait Sith
Too bad. It happens, though.
I know! Let's stay at the hotel! They know me here. I'll go talk to them.

Staff
I will let you know once the repairs are completed.
At the hotel, the entire team gathers in the lobby.

Cait Sith
We don't usually get the chance to be together like this, huh?
Cloud, how 'bout it? Can you tell us what's happened so far?
I don't really know what's goin' on because I wasn't here in the beginning.

Cid
Yeah! I'm all for it!

Vincent
Good idea.

Barret
I been here since the beginnin', an' I still don't know what the hell's goin' on either.
Cloud, the hell's goin' on? C'mon, tell us!

Cloud
- I'm tired...
- All right, I'll give it a shot...

Cid
All we have to do now is sleep! You're still young! What're you complaining about?

p.span: All right, I'll give it a shot...

scene.p: Nothing special happens.

Cloud
Phew...
We are going after Sephiroth.
Sephiroth must be in search of the Promised Land.

Cid
The Promised Land?

Cloud
A land full of Mako energy. ...or at least that's what the Shinra believe.
I don't know if it actually exists.

Aerith
The Cetras return to the Promised Land. A land that promises boundless happiness.

Barret
Cetra? That some kinda disease?

Aerith
That's what the Ancients call themselves.
Hey, didn't you listen to the elders at Cosmo Canyon?
Barret scratches his head.

Aerith
...You don't 'know' where the Promised Land of the Ancients is.
You search and travel, until you feel it. Like you just know, '...this is the Promised Land.'

Cloud
Aerith... can you feel it too?

Aerith
I think so.

Tifa
So Sephiroth is traveling the world because he's searching for the Promised Land? Is that it?

Aerith
That, and one other thing he's searching for.

Cloud
The Black Materia...

Cait Sith
I heard from Dio that a man in a Black Cape was lookin' for the Black Materia.

Tifa
I don't even know what the Black Cape is...
How many men with Black Capes and number tattoos are there?

Nanaki
...you know, of course... My tattoo is number 13.

Cloud
How did you get that tattoo?

Nanaki
...Hojo put it on me. Everything else is just war scars, but the number was done by Hojo.

Tifa
So there are at least 13!?

Aerith
...You know......
I think Hojo did something to those men in the Black Capes.
But I don't know what it has to do with Sephiroth though...
That's why I think we should just go after Sephiroth himself.

Barret
Yeah, me too! It's all just too damn confusin'.

Aerith
And...
I'm sorry, forget it!
I think I'm tired. I'm going to bed now.
She runs upstairs.

Cait Sith
What was that, all of a sudden!?

Yuffie
What!? That's it? I'm goin' to bed!
She runs off after Aerith.

Cait Sith
Is that all? How 'bout the Black Materia?

Cloud
You wouldn't understand even if I told you.

Barret
Now all we gotta do is take action! We're startin' tomorrow!!
He runs upstairs.

Nanaki
Cloud...
I'm number 13. Am I going to go mad too?

Tifa
I don't know what Hojo did to you, but you've been all right so far, right?

Nanaki
But...

Tifa
Be strong.

Nanaki
But, I...

Tifa
Stop it, Nanaki! Be strong!

Cloud
Tifa?

Tifa
You're not the only one who's worried!

Cait Sith
I don't know what's goin' on, but we're in a bad situation...

Vincent
Hey Cid, let's go back to our rooms.

Cid
...zzzz... zzzz...
Cloud retires to his room. There comes a knock on the door.

[Aerith enters.]
[Tifa enters.]
[Yuffie enters.]
[Barret enters.]
Aerith enters Cloud's room.

Aerith
Hee, hee!

Cloud
What's wrong?

Aerith
You want to go on a date?

Cloud
What?

Aerith
A DA-TE! Or haven't you ever gone on one?

Cloud
- Don't take me for a fool
- Well, not a real one...

p.span: Don't take me for a fool

scene.p:
Aerith
Hey...a little touchy, aren't we?

Aerith
No, just a mixed-up kid...

Aerith
Oh well, come on let's go...
She runs around behind him and starts pushing him out of the room.

Cloud
Hey!
Upon arriving together at the Station...

Man
Tonight's Enchantment Night! All the attractions are free.
How 'bout it you two? There's going to be an entertaining show in Event Square!

Aerith
Come on, let's go.
The two of them head for Event Square, where they are greeted immediately.

Man
Congratulations!!
You are our 100th couple today!!
You two will be the leads in tonight's show!!!!

Cloud
Wha?

Man
Oh, now, it's not hard. Just play it however you want to and the rest of the cast will cover up for you.
Come this way.

Cloud
H, hey!

Aerith
This sounds like fun. Come on Cloud, let's do it.
She runs off after the man. Cloud shrugs and follows. The show opens to an empty stage and the narration begins.

Narrator
Long, long ago...
An evil shadow appeared over the peaceful kingdom of Galdia...
Princess Rosa was just kidnapped by the Evil Dragon King, Valvados. What will become of her?
Just then, the legendary hero, Alfred, appears!!

Knight
Oh...... You must be the legendary hero...Alfred!
Cloud shakes his head, staring out at the audience.

Knight
Hey, it's your line.
Cloud points to himself incredulously.

Knight
Yeah, you.
Ahem!
Oh...... You must be the legendary hero, Alfred!
I know in my soul. Please... please save Princess Rosa!
Now......Please talk... to the King......!!

King
Oh...legendery hero, Alfred. You have come to save my beloved Rosa...
Oh the peak of a dangerous mountain...dwells the Evil Dragon King, Valvados... who's kidnapped Princess Rosa...
But... you can't beat the Evil Dragon King now! Talk to the one who can help you......
Who will you talk to?

Cloud
- The knight
- The wizard

Knight
I am...a lowly...knight. How...can I help you?

Cloud
- Defeat the Evil Dragon King
- Defeat the King

Narration
Oh what is going to happen next...! Oh...Legendary hero...look!
The Evil Dragon King enters carrying Aerith.

EDK
Gaaaaaaaah!
I am the Evil Dragon King...Valvados! I have not harmed the Princess... I have been expecting...you!

Aerith
Please help me...Legendary hero!
psst...... like that?

EDK
Gaaaaaah! Here I come, Legendary hero...Alfred!
I already know...your name!

Knight
Uuuuuuurrrrgghh!
He throws himself at the dragon king, but gets knocked out.

EDK
Gaaaaaaaaaaaahh! What now...Legendary hero!?

Cloud
- To the Princess
- To the King
- To home
Cloud goes to Aerith and kisses her hand.

Aerith
Cloud... I mean, Alfred...

EDK
Arrggaahhh!! Curses......The power of...love!!

King
Oh...look! Love has...triumphed!
Now let's all return... And celebrate.

Wizard
Yes let's...yes let's...!
The cast spins off the stage. Cloud and Aerith follow suit.

Narrator
Oh, how profound the power of love... And so the legendary hero Alfred and our story live on happily ever after.

Knight (still lying on the stage)
......... Someone...help......
[Back to the Station.]
Cloud goes to the king and kisses his hand.

King
Oh......Alfred...! In truth... I too......

EDK
Arrggaahhh!! Curses......The power of...love!!

King
Oh...look! Love has...triumphed!
Now let's all return... And celebrate.

Wizard
Yes let's...yes let's...!

Narration

Aerith
Wh, what is this?
You can't do this!
[Back to the Station.]

King
Come on! No more!

Aerith
Stop it Cloud! What are you doing!?
The play's a disaster! Now I'm getting mad!
She slaps Cloud and he falls over.

EDK
Gaaaaaahh! You dare ignore me!!

Aerith
Why don't you shut up, Blabbermouth!!
She knocks the EDK out, too.

Narrator
Oh my...... what an unusually strong Princess! And so the new legendary hero Rosa and our story ends happily ever after.

- The King
- That Knight

EDK

Cloud

- The Princess' measurements

Wizard
Ahh, the weakness of the Evil Dragon King. It must be, it must be...
Yes, it must be... True Love!
The power of love... Is the only weapon that can withstand the fangs of the EDK...!

A kiss! The power of True Love!!

- Kiss the King

After the play is over, Cloud and Aerith return to the Station.

Aerith
Oh, that was fun. Hey, let's go on the Gondola.
At Round Square, Aerith walks up to the ticket booth.

Aerith
Two, please.

Woman at Ticket Booth
Here you are, two tickets.
Enjoy the sights of Gold Saucer.
Cloud and Aerith get on the gondola.

Aerith
Wow, how nice.
Oh! Look, Cloud.
It's so pretty.
At length, she turns away from the window.

......it's beautiful, isn't it?
......first off, it bothered me how you looked exactly alike.
Two completely different people, but look exactly the same.
The way you walk, gesture...
I think I must have seen him again, in you...
But you're different.
Things are different.
Cloud...
I'm searching for you.

Aerith
I want to meet you.

Cloud
But I'm right here.

Aerith
(I know, I know...what I mean is...)
I want to meet...you.
The gondola returns to Round Square, and they get off.

Aerith
I had fun tonight. Let's go together again.
You don't like being with me?

Cloud
- Yeah
- That's not it

Aerith
Oh, don't tease like that!
Oh, look at the time. We'd better get going.

Aerith
I'm glad.
Next time let's take our time and go on more rides.

Cloud...

What's wrong?

......
I thought about what I was going to say, but, it's kinda embarrassing...
